statements: UPDATE luxury_partnerships SET partnership_type='Hotel', partner_name='Luxury Hotel A', contact_person='John Doe', contact_email='john.doe@example.com' WHERE partnership_id='123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
